entry.title: 2x4 LED Troffer Panel Ceiling Light, 2-Pack, 50W, 6250LM, 4000K(Natural White), Dimmable Recessed Ceiling Panel Lights
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace
Type: LED Troffers
Price: 268.49

LED troffer lights to come in square or rectangular shapes. LED troffer lights work better in modular drop ceilings. These lights are impeccable for educational, hospitality, and other institutions. These 50W LED Troffer Light come with a CCT of 4000K. These light fixtures will perfectly work at a voltage ranging between 120V - 277V. LED troffer lights are available with three features: Rebate Eligible, Frosted, and Dimmable that make these lights better than any conventional lights. With a lumen output of 6250 Lumens, these LED Troffer Light Fixtures can easily replace 175W fluorescents. LED troffer lights are a great choice for Ambient Lighting of Interior Commercial Spaces like commercial offices, schools, hospitals, retail merchandising, and many others. It's a UL, DLC, and RoHS certified light fixture that comes with a lifespan of 50,000 hours and a manufacturer warranty of 5-years. These LED Troffer Lights are the modern lighting system that not only provides proper lumens but gives a vibrant look to the place.
